    • Leader [540pts]

      • Gaunt Summoner on Disc of Tzeentch [180pts]

        Selections: 1. Bolt of Tzeentch

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, HERO, MORTAL, TZEENTCH, WIZARD, EVERCHOSEN, Leader

        Magic: Gaunt Summoner, Spell: Bolt of Tzeentch, Fractal Mindstorm, Unit: Gaunt Summoner on Disc of Tzeentch, Unit Abilities: Book of Profane Secrets, Fly, Hovering Disc of Tzeentch, Warptongue Blade, Weapon: Changestaff, Disc of Tzeentch's blades and stingers, Warptongue Blade


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Gaunt Summoner 2/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Fractal Mindstorm
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Bolt of Tzeentch 8If successfully cast, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of the caster. The unit you pick suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Fractal Mindstorm See belowBefore attempting to cast the spell, choose an enemy unit within 9" of the caster. The spell has a casting value equal to the Bravery of the unit you chose. If the spell is successfully cast, roll a number of dice equal to the unit's Bravery. It suffers 1 mortal wound for each dice that rolls 4 or more.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Gaunt Summoner on Disc of Tzeentch 16"586+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Book of Profane Secrets Once per battle, at the end of your movement phase, if this model is within 9" of a Realmgate it can use its Book of Profane Secrets. If it does so, you can summon 1 unit from the list below to the battlefield, and add it to your army. The summoned unit must be set up wholly within 9" of a this model and wholly within 9" of the Realmgate, and more than 9" from any enemy units. Choose a unit from the following list: • 10 Pink Horrors • 10 Bloodletters • 10 Plaguebearers • 10 Daemonettes *ERRATA Everchosen Jul'18*
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Hovering Disc of Tzeentch Add 2 to the Summoner's save rolls in the combat phase unless the attacker is a MONSTER or can fly.
        Warptongue Blade If a Warptongue Blade inflicts damage on an enemy unit, roll two dice. If the roll is higher than the enemy unit's Bravery, one model in the unit is slain. Otherwise, the blade inflicts 1 wound.

        Incorporeal Form Your opponent must subtract 1 from any hit rolls that target your general in the combat phase.

        Glimpse the Future 7Only one of your WIZARDS can attempt to cast this spell per turn. If successfully cast, roll a dice and add it to your Destiny Dice pool.

    • Battleline [360pts]

      • Pink Horrors of Tzeentch [180pts]

        Selections: 10 Pink Horrors [180pts], 4. Unchecked Mutation

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, TZEENTCH, WIZARD, PINK HORRORS, Battleline

        Magic: Pink Horrors of Tzeentch, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Unchecked Mutation, Unit: Pink Horrors of Tzeentch, Unit Abilities: Flickering Flames, Iridescent Horror, Locus of Conjuration, Weapon: Grasping Hands (Pink Horror), Magical Flames (Pink Horror)


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Pink Horrors of Tzeentch 1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unchecked Mutation 7If successfully cast, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of the caster.That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. After the mortal wounds have been allocated, roll a dice. On a roll of 5 or more, the unit suffers 1 more mortal wound. If the unit suffers 1 more mortal wound, roll a dice after the mortal wound has been allocated; on a roll of 5 or more the unit suffers 1 more mortal wound, and so on until you fail to roll a 5 or more. *FAQ v1.4*
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Pink Horrors of Tzeentch 5"1105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Flickering Flames You can add 1 to hit rolls made for a Pink Horror’s Magical Flames attack if its unit contains 20 or more models.
        Iridescent Horror The leader of this unit is the Iridescent Horror. An Iridescent Horror makes 2 attacks rather than 1 with its Grasping Hands.
        Locus of Conjuration You can add 1 to any casting rolls made for this unit if it is within 9" of any Tzeentch Daemon Heroes from your army.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Grasping Hands (Pink Horror) Melee1"15+4+-1
        Magical Flames (Pink Horror) Missile18"14+4+-1

      • Pink Horrors of Tzeentch [180pts]

        Selections: 10 Pink Horrors [180pts], 2. Treason of Tzeentch, Hornblowers, Icon Bearers

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, TZEENTCH, WIZARD, PINK HORRORS, Battleline

        Magic: Pink Horrors of Tzeentch, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Treason of Tzeentch, Unit: Pink Horrors of Tzeentch, Unit Abilities: Flickering Flames, Hornblowers, Icon Bearers, Iridescent Horror, Locus of Conjuration, Weapon: Grasping Hands (Pink Horror), Magical Flames (Pink Horror)


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Pink Horrors of Tzeentch 1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Treason of Tzeentch 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit with 2 or more models that is within 18” of the caster and which is visible to them. Roll a dice for each model in the unit you picked. It suffers 1 mortal wound for each dice roll of 6 or more. If, after any of the mortal wounds caused by this spell are allocated, only one model remains in the unit, any remaining mortal wounds caused by this spell are negated and have no effect.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Pink Horrors of Tzeentch 5"1105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Flickering Flames You can add 1 to hit rolls made for a Pink Horror’s Magical Flames attack if its unit contains 20 or more models.
        Hornblowers Models in this unit can be Hornblowers. Your opponent must re‑roll battleshock tests of 1 for units that are within 6" of any Hornblowers.
        Icon Bearers Models in this unit may be Icon Bearers. If the unmodified roll for a battleshock test for a unit that includes any Icon Bearers is 1, you can add D6 models to that unit, and no models from that unit will flee in that battleshock phase. *ERRATA Jun'18*
        Iridescent Horror The leader of this unit is the Iridescent Horror. An Iridescent Horror makes 2 attacks rather than 1 with its Grasping Hands.
        Locus of Conjuration You can add 1 to any casting rolls made for this unit if it is within 9" of any Tzeentch Daemon Heroes from your army.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Grasping Hands (Pink Horror) Melee1"15+4+-1
        Magical Flames (Pink Horror) Missile18"14+4+-1

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Selections: Tzeentch

        Categories: Allegiance, TZEENTCH

        Battle Trait: Masters of Destiny, Summon Daemons of Tzeentch, Fate Point Summoning Table - Unit: 1 Burning Chariot of Tzeentch, 1 Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch, 1 Exalted Greater Daemon of Tzeentch, 1 Herald of Tzeentch, 1 Herald of Tzeentch on Burning Chariot, 1 Herald of Tzeentch on Disc, 1 Lord of Change, 10 Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, 10 Brimstone Horrors of Tzeentch, 10 Pink Horrors of Tzeentch, 3 Flamers of Tzeentch, 3 Screamers of Tzeentch


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Masters of Destiny After set-up, but before rolling to see which player takes the first turn in the first battle round, roll 9 dice and keep them to one side; this is your pool of Destiny Dice. Though it is possible for some or even all of these dice to be replenished during the course of the battle, the number of dice in your pool of Destiny Dice can never exceed 9. Before rolling any dice for a TZEENTCH unit, you can use one or more of the remaining Destiny Dice from your pool in their stead; the result of the roll you would have made is automatically substituted with the result shown on the Destiny Dice you have chosen to use. [...] Destiny Dice can be expended to fix the result of any of the following nine types of dice rolls: Casting roll; Unbinding roll; Run roll; Charge roll; Hit roll; Wound roll; Save roll; Damage roll (e.g. any roll that determines a Damage characteristic, but not any roll that determines the number of mortal wounds inflicted by a spell or ability); Battleshock test
        Summon Daemons of Tzeentch You can summon units of Tzeentch Daemons to the battlefield by expending Fate Points. You receive 1 Fate Point each time a casting roll is successful, and the spell is not unbound. Note that you receive Fate Points whenever a spell is cast, be it by friend or foe – Tzeentch cares not from whence the magic flows! If you have 10 or more Fate Points at the end of your movement phase, you can summon one or more units from the list below onto the battlefield, and add them to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of Fate Points, as shown on the list, and you can only summon a unit if you have enough Fate Points to pay its cost. Summoned units must be set up wholly within 12" of a friendly Tzeentch Hero and more than 9" from any enemy units. Subtract the cost of the summoned unit from the number of Fate Points you have immediately after the summoned unit has been set up.
        Fate Point Summoning Table - Unit Cost Ref
        1 Burning Chariot of Tzeentch 18
        1 Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch 12
        1 Exalted Greater Daemon of Tzeentch 45
        1 Herald of Tzeentch 12
        1 Herald of Tzeentch on Burning Chariot 24
        1 Herald of Tzeentch on Disc 12
        1 Lord of Change 36
        10 Blue Horrors of Tzeentch 10
        10 Brimstone Horrors of Tzeentch 10
        10 Pink Horrors of Tzeentch 20
        3 Flamers of Tzeentch 18
        3 Screamers of Tzeentch 10

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

    • Malign Sorcery [40pts]

      • Endless Spell: Soulsnare Shackles [40pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, SHYISH, SOULSNARE SHACKLES, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Soulsnare Shackles, Unit Abilities: Bound for the Great Oubliette, Empowered by Shyish


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Soulsnare Shackles 5If successfully cast, set up a Soulsnare Shackles model wholly within 12" of the caster, then set up the second and third Soulsnare Shackles models wholly within 6" of the first.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bound for the Great Oubliette At the start of the movement phase, roll a dice for each unit within 6" of any Soulsnare Shackles models. On a 3+ halve the move characteristic of that unit until the end of that phase. On a 6 that unit also suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Empowered by Shyish If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Death, the second and third Soulsnare Shackles models can be set up wholly within 9" of the first, instead of 6".
